website_summaries.verdict: Offers pro-level quality at a consumer-friendly price. It’s a powerful outdoor RC helicopter that's incredibly easy to fly.
pros: It’s got four channels, so it can fly left and right in addition to the standard directions
A kit with replacement parts is only $20
cons: A full battery will only power an eight-minute flight

customer_reviews.title: Move to China for charging toy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so mad!!! Bought this as a gift. When he took it out of the package the plug for the charger is for China. He can't even charge it to use it. Also all instructions are in Chinese. Don't waste your time. It says nothing about this when you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product easy to fly,, but needs to be trimmed out and swash leveled before first flight.
customer_reviews.author: paul tapscott

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Did not bring on off button the helicopter doesnt work!
customer_reviews.author: juan san martin

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners, keep tail blades out of grass!
customer_reviews.text: great 4channel heli to learn on before you make the jump to collective pitch, very durable, and upper crash kit is only 20$ ehich has every part youd break. tail motor died after about a week, keep it out of grass as the resistance on the tail blades will kill it. luckily had another and soldered it right in. would recommend to any beginner. only downside was i bought this 83.99 one when they go for 65ish normally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and already broken
customer_reviews.text: To be honest my expectations weren’t high seeing as how it’s not a very expensive helicopter however the batteries die very quickly and the range is not very far. The quality seems very low of the parts used and after only 20 minutes it is already broken and beyond repair internally.
customer_reviews.author: Preston G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Machine
customer_reviews.text: It's harder for beginners but I like it and it doesn't handle exactly the way I'd like but it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Collins

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: After flying this a few times and some crash landing. The cockpit cover broke off and its a European plug I had to go out and spend an additional $30 to get a travel converter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: it does fly ok
customer_reviews.text: most heli's in this price range are junk. this heli really flies ok with a little tweeking
customer_reviews.author: sky dog

customer_reviews.title: A budget Bird
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad for a budget RC Helicopter, Not for indoors and very strong so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: BBGun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not good, don’t buy it, plus when I was try to return it they made me pay a shipping fee but I didn’t know was going to cost me 59.95 then the email we we only can cover you 29.96 wow really wack!
customer_reviews.author: Simean10

customer_reviews.title: Brittle
customer_reviews.text: Front frame broke off on initial flight. Didnt even hit anything.
customer_reviews.author: johann

customer_reviews.title: Maneuvers in all directions & hovering is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional well engineered helicopter. Maneuvers in all directions & hovering is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Overall package is a great deal, but this failure is inexcusable no matter ...
customer_reviews.text: Tail rotor motor died after about 20 minutes of cumulative flight time. Overall package is a great deal, but this failure is inexcusable no matter the cost of the helicopter. I'll buy a replacement motor, but not too thrilled about the downtime.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Song

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a beginner to fly but this is not for outdoors despite its size.
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 helicopters so keep that it mind. The price is reasonable for a helicopter with radio. This helicopter has a bad habit of burning out motors if you do multiple flights. Although it is reasonably large, I would not recommend this for outside flying. It is not powerful enough against even moderate winds. To fly inside, it is reasonably stable and not bad for a beginner. Only comes with Asian power cord so you need to buy and adapter so that adds to the price. Despite any name trying to sell you one, these are all WLtoys Helicopters. You can step up to a v913 with brushless motors for a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Eric
